job.title: 高级软件工程师
job.description: <p>This job is based in Beijing, China. </p><p><br></p><p><strong>高级软件工程师- Senior Software Engineer </strong></p><p><u>工作职责</u>：</p><ul><li>根据需求快速开发产品配套软件</li><li>根据产线要求开发生产工具软件</li><li>编写研发项目文档</li><li>及时完成部门经理临时交办的其他任务。</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>任职资格</u></strong></p><ul><li>计算机或电子相关专业, 本科及以上学历,一本院校优先.</li><li>精通一门编程语言(Python优先)</li><li>熟悉CAN总线、UART、TCP等通信方式</li><li>有团队合作精神，能及时分享知识和经验；</li><li>五年工作经历</li><li>有大型仪器类项目经验者优先.</li></ul><p><strong>Senior Software Engineer</strong></p><p><strong><u>Job Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><p>1. Quickly develop product supporting software based on requirement</p><p>2. Develop production tool software according based on requirements</p><p>3. Write R&amp;D project documentation</p><p>4. Complete other tasks assigned by the department manager in a timely manner.</p><p><strong><u>Qualifications</u></strong></p><ul><li>Computer or electronics related major, bachelor degree or above</li><li>Proficient in a programming language (Python is preferred)</li><li>Familiar with CAN bus, UART, TCP and other communication methods</li><li>Have a team spirit and be able to share knowledge and experience in a timely manner;</li><li>Five years of work experience</li><li>Experience in large-scale instrument projects is preferred.</li></ul><p><br></p>
